plot: Ash is a student at Ansalivan Dragon Academy, attended by children who have formed contracts with dragons. He possesses the "star mark," the sign of a contract, but since his partner hasn't been born yet, he seems insignificant. The awakening of the dragon he's raising inside his body is triggered by an incident, and it emerges in the form of a young girl.
opening_theme: "Seiken Nante Iranai (聖剣なんていらない;I Don't Need a Holy Sword)" by Yui Sakakibara
ending_theme: "MOST Ijō no 'MOSTEST' (MOST以上の“MOSTEST”;A 'Mostest' More Than Most)" by Mariya Ise & Ayane Sakura & Marina Inoue
"MOST Ijō no 'MOSTEST' (MOST以上の“MOSTEST”;A 'Mostest' More Than Most)" by Asuka Ōgame, Asami Shimoda, & Kana Hanazawa (eps 7-11)
"MOST Ijō no 'MOSTEST' (MOST以上の“MOSTEST”;A 'Mostest' More Than Most)" by Mariya Ise, Ayane Sakura, Marina Inoue, Asuka Ōgame, Asami Shimoda, & Kana Hanazawa (ep 12)
